title: enaDu dhaya
sahitya:
ennaDu daya vaccunO inakula tilaka

anupallavi

pannaga shayana nAdu paritApamulanu dIrcuTaku

caraNam

kari moraliDagAnE vacci kanikaramutO brOvalEdA dharabaDi hariyani draupadini brOva lEdA
 cira jIvityAdi sakala varamulosagu vADavanacu caraNamulanu neranammiti varada venkaTEshvara nIku
